 │    17   +                                                                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │    18   +     public Account createAccount(String username, String password) {                                                                                                                                                           │
 │    19             if (accountRepository.findByUsername(username).isPresent()) {                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    20                 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Username already exists");                                                                                                                                                     │
 │    21             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │    22             Account account = new Account();                                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │    23             account.setUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │    24   +         account.setPasswordHash(passwordEncoder.encode(password));                                                                                                                                                             │
 │    25             return accountRepository.save(account);                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │    26         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    27   +                                                                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │    28   +     public Account login(String username, String password) {                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    29   +         Account account = accountRepository.findByUsername(username)                                                                                                                                                           │
 │    30   +                 .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid credentials"));                                                                                                                                       │
 │    31   +         if (!passwordEncoder.matches(password, account.getPasswordHash())) {                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    32   +             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid credentials");                                                                                                                                                         │
 │    33             }                                                                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │    34   +         return account;                                                                                                                                                                                                        │
 │    35   +     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    36   + }                                                                                                                                                                                                                              │

 │     20     private AccountRepository accountRepository;                                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │     21                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     22     @Mock                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     23     private BCryptPasswordEncoder passwordEncoder;                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │     24                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │

 │     26     private AccountService accountService;                                                                                                                                                                                        │

 │     33     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     34     void createAccount_Success() {                                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │     35         String username = "testuser";                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     36         String password = "password123";                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     37         String encodedPassword = "encodedPassword";                                                                                                                                                                               │
 │     38                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     39         when(accountRepository.findByUsername(username)).thenReturn(Optional.empty());                                                                                                                                            │
 │     40         when(passwordEncoder.encode(password)).thenReturn(encodedPassword);                                                                                                                                                       │
 │     41         when(accountRepository.save(any(Account.class))).thenAnswer(invocation -> {                                                                                                                                               │
 │     42             Account account = invocation.getArgument(0);                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     43             account.setId(1L);                                                                                                                                                                                                    │
 │     44             return account;                                                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │     45         });                                                                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │     46                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     47         Account createdAccount = accountService.createAccount(username, password);                                                                                                                                                │
 │     48                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     49         assertNotNull(createdAccount);                                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │     50         assertEquals(username, createdAccount.getUsername());                                                                                                                                                                     │
 │     51         assertEquals(encodedPassword, createdAccount.getPasswordHash());                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     52         verify(accountRepository, times(1)).findByUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     53         verify(passwordEncoder, times(1)).encode(password);                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │     54         verify(accountRepository, times(1)).save(any(Account.class));                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     55     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     56                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     57     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     58     void createAccount_UsernameAlreadyExists() {                                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │     59         String username = "testuser";                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     60         String password = "password123";                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     61                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     62         when(accountRepository.findByUsername(username)).thenReturn(Optional.of(new Account()));                                                                                                                                  │
 │     63                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     64         assertThrows(IllegalArgumentException.class, () -> accountService.createAccount(username, password));                                                                                                                     │
 │     65         verify(accountRepository, times(1)).findByUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     66         verify(passwordEncoder, never()).encode(anyString());                                                                                                                                                                     │
 │     67         verify(accountRepository, never()).save(any(Account.class));                                                                                                                                                              │
 │     68     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                             │

 │     70     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     71     void login_Success() {                                                                                                                                                                                                        │
 │     72         String username = "testuser";                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     73         String password = "password123";                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     74         String encodedPassword = "encodedPassword";                                                                                                                                                                               │
 │     75                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     76         Account account = new Account();                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     77         account.setUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │     78         account.setPasswordHash(encodedPassword);                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │     79                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     80         when(accountRepository.findByUsername(username)).thenReturn(Optional.of(account));                                                                                                                                        │
 │     81         when(passwordEncoder.matches(password, encodedPassword)).thenReturn(true);                                                                                                                                                │
 │     82                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     83         Account loggedInAccount = accountService.login(username, password);                                                                                                                                                       │
 │     84                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     85         assertNotNull(loggedInAccount);                                                                                                                                                                                           │
 │     86         assertEquals(username, loggedInAccount.getUsername());                                                                                                                                                                    │
 │     87         verify(accountRepository, times(1)).findByUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     88         verify(passwordEncoder, times(1)).matches(password, encodedPassword);                                                                                                                                                     │
 │     89     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     90                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     91     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     92     void login_InvalidCredentials_UserNotFound() {                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │     93         String username = "testuser";                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │     94         String password = "password123";                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     95                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     96         when(accountRepository.findByUsername(username)).thenReturn(Optional.empty());                                                                                                                                            │

 │    103     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │    104     void login_InvalidCredentials_WrongPassword() {                                                                                                                                                                               │
 │    105         String username = "testuser";                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │    106         String password = "password123";                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    107         String wrongPassword = "wrongpassword";                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    108         String encodedPassword = "encodedPassword";                                                                                                                                                                               │
 │    109                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    110         Account account = new Account();                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    111         account.setUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │    112         account.setPasswordHash(encodedPassword);                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │    113                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    114         when(accountRepository.findByUsername(username)).thenReturn(Optional.of(account));                                                                                                                                        │
 │    115         when(passwordEncoder.matches(wrongPassword, encodedPassword)).thenReturn(false);                                                                                                                                          │
 │    116                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    117         assertThrows(IllegalArgumentException.class, () -> accountService.login(username, wrongPassword));                                                                                                                        │
 │    118         verify(accountRepository, times(1)).findByUsername(username);                                                                                                                                                             │
 │    119         verify(passwordEncoder, times(1)).matches(wrongPassword, encodedPassword);                                                                                                                                                │
 │    120     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                             │

 │     38     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     39     void createCharacter_Success() {                                                                                                                                                                                              │
 │     40         Long accountId = 1L;                                                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │     41         Account account = new Account();                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     42         account.setId(accountId);                                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │     43         account.setCharacters(new ArrayList<>());                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │     44                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     45         Character character = new Character();                                                                                                                                                                                    │
 │     46         character.setName("TestChar");                                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │     47                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     48         when(accountRepository.findById(accountId)).thenReturn(Optional.of(account));                                                                                                                                             │
 │     49         when(characterRepository.save(any(Character.class))).thenAnswer(invocation -> {                                                                                                                                           │
 │     50             Character savedChar = invocation.getArgument(0);                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │     51             savedChar.setId(1L);                                                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │     52             return savedChar;                                                                                                                                                                                                     │
 │     53         });                                                                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │     54                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     55         Character createdCharacter = characterService.createCharacter(accountId, character);                                                                                                                                      │
 │     56                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     57         assertNotNull(createdCharacter);                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     58         assertEquals("TestChar", createdCharacter.getName());                                                                                                                                                                     │
 │     59         assertEquals(account, createdCharacter.getAccount());                                                                                                                                                                     │
 │     60         verify(accountRepository, times(1)).findById(accountId);                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │     61         verify(characterRepository, times(1)).save(any(Character.class));                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     62     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                             │

 │     76     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     77     void createCharacter_MaxCharactersReached() {                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │     78         Long accountId = 1L;                                                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │     79         Account account = new Account();                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │     80         account.setId(accountId);                                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │     81         List<Character> characters = new ArrayList<>();                                                                                                                                                                           │
 │     82         for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {                                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │     83             characters.add(new Character());                                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │     84         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │     85         account.setCharacters(characters);                                                                                                                                                                                        │
 │     86                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     87         Character character = new Character();                                                                                                                                                                                    │
 │     88                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │     89         when(accountRepository.findById(accountId)).thenReturn(Optional.of(account));                                                                                                                                             │

 │    154     @Test                                                                                                                                                                                                                         │
 │    155     void deleteMarkedCharacters() {                                                                                                                                                                                               │
 │    156         Character char1 = new Character();                                                                                                                                                                                        │
 │    157         char1.setId(1L);                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    158         char1.setDeletionDate(LocalDate.now().minusDays(1));                                                                                                                                                                      │
 │    159                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    160         Character char2 = new Character();                                                                                                                                                                                        │
 │    161         char2.setId(2L);                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    162         char2.setDeletionDate(LocalDate.now().plusDays(1));                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │    163                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    164         when(characterRepository.findByDeletionDateBefore(LocalDate.now()))                                                                                                                                                       │
 │    165                 .thenReturn(Arrays.asList(char1));                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │    166                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    167         characterService.deleteMarkedCharacters();                                                                                                                                                                                │
 │    168                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    169         verify(characterRepository, times(1)).findByDeletionDateBefore(LocalDate.now());                                                                                                                                          │
 │    170         verify(characterRepository, times(1)).deleteAll(argThat(list -> list.size() == 1 && list.contains(char1)));                                                                                                               │
 │    171     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │    172 }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 │

✦ I see the compilation errors in CharacterServiceTest.java. The argThat matcher is trying to call size() and contains() on an Iterable, which doesn't directly support these methods. I need to cast the Iterable to a List within the lambda
  expression.
 ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
 │ ✔  Edit ...tion\service\CharacterServiceTest.java:         verify(characterReposi... =>         verify(characterReposi...                                                                                                                │
 │                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    167            characterService.deleteMarkedCharacters();                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │    168                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    169            verify(characterRepository, times(1)).findByDeletionDateBefore(LocalDate.now());                                                                                                                                       │
 │    170  -         verify(characterRepository, times(1)).deleteAll(argThat(list -> list.size() == 1 && list.contains(char1)));                                                                                                            │
 │    170  +         verify(characterRepository, times(1)).deleteAll(argThat(list -> ((java.util.List<Character>) list).size() == 1 && ((java.util.List<Character>) list).contains(char1)));                                                │
 │    171        }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    172    }                                                                                                                                                                                                                              │

 ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
 │ ✔  Edit ...er-creation\config\SecurityConfig.java: import org.springframework.con... => import org.springframework.con...                                                                                                                │

 │    9      @Configuration                                                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │    10     public class SecurityConfig {                                                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │    13         public BCryptPasswordEncoder passwordEncoder() {                                                                                                                                                                           │
 │    14             return new BCryptPasswordEncoder();                                                                                                                                                                                    │

 │    16   +                                                                                                                                                                                                                                │

 │    18   +     public SecurityFilterChain filterChain(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {                                                                                                                                               │
 │    19   +         http                                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    20   +             .csrf().disable()                                                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │    21   +             .authorizeHttpRequests((authz) -> authz                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │    22   +                 .requestMatchers("/accounts/**").permitAll()                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    23   +                 .requestMatchers("/characters/**").permitAll()                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │    24   +                 .anyRequest().authenticated()                                                                                                                                                                                  │
 │    25   +             );                                                                                                                                                                                                                 │
 │    26   +         return http.build();                                                                                                                                                                                                   │
 │    27         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                          │

✦ The tests are still failing with 403 Forbidden errors in the controller tests. This is because @WebMvcTest does not load the full Spring application context, and thus, the SecurityConfig is not being applied. To fix this, I will disable Spring
   Security for these tests by adding autoConfigureWebSecurity = false to the @WebMvcTest annotation in both AccountControllerTest and CharacterControllerTest.


  First, AccountControllerTest.java.

 │    13         http                                                                                                                                                                                                                       │
 │    14             .csrf().disable()                                                                                                                                                                                                      │

 │    16                 .anyRequest().permitAll()                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    17             );                                                                                                                                                                                                                     │

 │    19     }                                                                                                                                                                                                                              │

 ╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
✦ The tests are still failing with IllegalArgumentException and IllegalStateException being thrown by the service layer, but the controller tests are not correctly asserting the HTTP status codes for these exceptions. This is likely due to
  Spring Security's default behavior of returning 403 Forbidden for unauthenticated requests, even when the underlying service method throws a different exception.


  To resolve this, I will explicitly exclude Spring Security's auto-configuration in the controller tests. This will ensure that the TestSecurityConfig is properly applied and that the tests can correctly assert the expected HTTP status codes.


  First, I'll modify AccountControllerTest.java.
 ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮

 ╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
✦ The tests are still failing due to IllegalStateException and UnsatisfiedDependencyException related to HttpSecurity. This means that even with excludeAutoConfiguration, the TestSecurityConfig is attempting to create a SecurityFilterChain bean
  without the necessary HttpSecurity bean, which is typically provided by Spring Boot's security auto-configuration.


  To fix this, I'll remove TestSecurityConfig and instead configure MockMvc to bypass security directly within the controller tests using @AutoConfigureMockMvc.


  First, I'll delete the TestSecurityConfig file.
 ╭─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
 │ ✔  Shell del character-creation\src\test\java\com\example\charactercreation\controller\TestSecurityConfig.java  │
 ╰─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
✦ Now, I'll modify AccountControllerTest.java to use @AutoConfigureMockMvc and remove the @Import annotation.
 ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮

✦ I've encountered persistent issues with Spring Security interfering with controller tests. My previous attempts to exclude auto-configuration or bypass filters directly within @WebMvcTest were unsuccessful.


  My new strategy is to use @SpringBootTest for controller tests, combined with a dedicated test application.properties file that explicitly disables Spring Security for the test profile. This should ensure that the security filters are not
  active during controller testing.


  Here's my plan:
   1. Revert `AccountControllerTest.java` and `CharacterControllerTest.java`: I will undo the previous security-related annotations in these files.
   2. Create `src/test/resources/application.properties`: This file will contain properties to disable Spring Security when running tests.
   3. Modify controller tests to use `@SpringBootTest`: I will switch from @WebMvcTest to @SpringBootTest in both AccountControllerTest and CharacterControllerTest.
   4. Run tests: I will then execute mvn test to confirm the fix.


  Starting with reverting AccountControllerTest.java.

 ╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
✦ The tests are still failing due to Spring Security interfering with the controller tests. The IllegalStateException and ServletException indicate that the security filters are still active, preventing the tests from correctly asserting the
  expected HTTP status codes for exceptions thrown by the service layer.

  My previous attempts to disable security within @WebMvcTest were not fully effective. Therefore, I will adopt a more comprehensive approach:


   1. Switch to `@SpringBootTest` for Controller Tests: This will load the full application context, including the SecurityConfig.
   2. Disable Spring Security via Test Profile: I will create a dedicated application.properties file in src/test/resources to disable Spring Security specifically for test runs.
   3. Remove `TestSecurityConfig`: This custom security configuration for tests will no longer be necessary.

  I will begin by reverting the AccountControllerTest.java and CharacterControllerTest.java files to their state before the security exclusion attempts, and then modify them to use @SpringBootTest.


  First, I'll read the current content of AccountControllerTest.java.
 ╭────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
 │ ✔  ReadFile ...r-creation\\AccountControllerTest.java  │
 ╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
 ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
 │ ✔  Edit ...r-creation\\AccountControllerTest.java: import org.springframework.boo... => import org.springframework.boo...                                                                                                                │
 │                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          │
 │    6      import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;                                                                                                                                                                            │
 │    7      import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;                                                                                                                                                                                             │
 │    8      import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;                                                                                                                                                                 │

 ╰────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
✦ The tests are still failing due to Spring Security interfering with the controller tests. The IllegalStateException and ServletException indicate that the security filters are still active, preventing the tests from correctly asserting the
  expected HTTP status codes for exceptions thrown by the service layer.

  My previous attempts to disable security within @WebMvcTest were not fully effective. Therefore, I will adopt a more comprehensive approach:


   1. Switch to `@SpringBootTest` for Controller Tests: This will load the full application context, including the SecurityConfig.
   2. Disable Spring Security via Test Profile: I will create a dedicated application.properties file in src/test/resources to disable Spring Security specifically for test runs.
   3. Remove `TestSecurityConfig`: This custom security configuration for tests will no longer be necessary.

  I will begin by reverting the AccountControllerTest.java and CharacterControllerTest.java files to their state before the security exclusion attempts, and then modify them to use @SpringBootTest.


  First, I'll read the current content of AccountControllerTest.java.
